imdb.title: Prince of Stride: Alternative
imdb.plot: "Stride" is an extreme form of sport. It involves 6 players on a team that runs relay races in towns. The story takes place at Honan Academy where two first-year high-school students try to recruit members for their club.

episodes.title: On Your Mark - The Beginning of Destiny
episodes.plot: Nana Sakurai loves Stride, the street-running team sport. She chooses to enter Honan Academy, based on an awesome internet video she saw of the Honan Stride Club. However, choosing an academic path based on an internet video may not have been a good idea.

episodes.title: Believe - I Will Always Be Here
episodes.plot: It's clear that Takeru Fujiwara is a very talented runner, but it seems like he has teamwork problems. The Honan Academy Stride Club has plenty of other problems too, and they only have a few weeks to solve them all.

episodes.title: Galaxy - Now, Stars Who Shine
episodes.plot: The End of Summer Semi Finals are here! Riku has recovered from his slump and the team is ready to win. The Honan team will face off against their long-time rival, Saisei High School.

episodes.title: Run - When the Mind Is Full
episodes.plot: Stride season is here, and high school teams from all over Japan compete for the spot in the End of Summer event. Honan faces off against Mihashi in the Atami hot springs resort area.

episodes.title: Again - Just You, Only You
episodes.plot: Honan Academy wins the race, but Ayumu is injured in the process. They must find a replacement soon, but in order to do so, the team must revisit a painful event from the past.

episodes.title: Team-Connect Emotions, Become the Wind
episodes.plot: Kyosuke Kuga returns to the Honan Stride Club to cover for the injured Ayumu. The Honan team face off against Ichijokan, but before they face their opponent, they must first face their own emotions.

episodes.title: Rival-A Promise for August
episodes.plot: Before the EOS final, Honan and Saisei are having joint practice in Saisei's stride facility.

episodes.title: Wall - Chasing, Still So Far Away
episodes.plot: EOS time trial. Saisei vs Tsubakimachi and Honan vs Kakyoin in Sapporo Dome. Will Honan get intimated by their former runner?

episodes.title: Home - The One and Only
episodes.plot: The defeat against Kakyoin sends the Honan team's spirit down to an all-time low. The younger members of the team seem to be most heavily affected. The team decides to do something different to improve the atmosphere and communicate some valuable points.

episodes.title: Stand Up - Because You Were There
episodes.plot: Riku loses hope that he'll ever be able to be as good as everyone wants him to so he can catch up to his brother. Will Takeru be able to reignite his passion for Stride?

episodes.title: Episode #1.11
episodes.plot: The End of Summer Semi Finals are here! Riku has recovered from his slump and the team is ready to win. The Honan team will face off against their long-time rival, Saisei High School.

episodes.title: Episode #1.12
episodes.plot: The final race is about to begin. Riku must face off against his brother, and is obviously nervous about it. However, his teammates are ready to support him.
